name: GoodNinja
description:
Asalam o Alaikum Everyone 

GoodNinja is a Cute Platformer Game where you can...

1 Hide behind objects to avoid Fans.

2 Collecting 6 gems gives extra life.

3 Collect hearts to Complete the Stage.

No Musical instruments are used in my game.

Youtube Channel "GameChef"

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYExc28X-qUapw5ZHeZ4csQ
